block.p: Law school is hot, and business school is not. In a turnaround that surprised educators, the number of people applying to the nation's law schools has increased in each of the last two years, after a decade of steep declines. Meanwhile, almost every top business school received fewer applications this year. Some experienced declines of up to 20 pecent.
